structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The cost of autopsies shall be paid for by the fiscal court; provided, however, that the Justice and Public Safety Cabinet, Office of the Kentucky State Medical Examiner, may contract with pathologists and toxicologists and chemists and pay for such autopsies within the budgetary limitations of funds appropriated by the General Assembly for this purpose.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 154, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 65, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 93, sec. 16, effective June 17, 1978.
